15.1 Thank you for visiting our Doctor 24×7 application and for registering as a member.

15.2 Your privacy is important to us. To better protect your privacy, we provide this notice explaining our policy regarding the information you share with us. This privacy policy refers to the information we collect online from the application, received via email, fax, or phone, in person, or in any other way, and that we store and use to provide you with services. If you do not agree to the terms of this policy, please do not use these portals and/or do not sign the contractual document.

15.3 To use the services of this application, you need to register by verifying the authorized device. This privacy policy applies to your information that we collect and receive on and through Doctor 24×7; it does not apply to the practices of activities that we do not own or control or to people we do not employ.

15.4 By using this application, you accept the terms of this privacy policy.
